title: Google General Tips and Tricks
text: Use quotes search exact request, just words order Use quotesWhen searching something specific: use quotes.Search: Sun perineum engine search content contains 3 words order.search ‚ÄúSun perineum‚Äù search phrase exactly typed . pic.twitter.com/4fYbkbWewN Use two periods within two numbers search ranges: E.g. Books 1990..2000

title: Google General Tips and Tricks
text: Use filetype:pdf find PDFs related search request Find specific fileSyntax:  Wisdom filetype:pdfWill show pdfs related 'wisdom'.can mostly useful scholarly purposes, business presentations assorted presentations. pic.twitter.com/SdEeNpIZlA Use site:xxx search specific site xxx Use colon search specific sitesSearch: law attraction site:https://t.co/XRep1lKOZUWill show results 'law attraction' website. pic.twitter.com/YidNyJkQht Add @ front word search social media Use @ search social mediaAdd @ front word search social media. Search: infinitians@twitterWill show results Infinitians Twitter. pic.twitter.com/BqW1SsfleO Tune image search specific colour, size, copyright, time oder type Look images specific colour, size, copyright, time type.search Deadpool tune result colour orangeIt give images orange Deadpool.Yup really. pic.twitter.com/wNCXAWttUU Use - exclude words phrases results Use hyphen exclude wordsUsing "-" excludes words phrases results.Search: Rocky -filmWill show results related 'rocky' general film Rocky.

title: Google General Tips and Tricks
text: Use related:xxx find sites related xxx Find sites similar sitesSearch: related:https://t.co/QOHfyrxF81Will show sites related Twitter. pic.twitter.com/Y6IDeFm3wC Use VS compare two things Compare two things using ‚Äúvs‚Äù want determine whether living Bali better Dubai Just search: Bali VS Dubai pic.twitter.com/yXCGb3LLS8 Use ~ front word find synonyms Add tilde (~) front word find synonyms search iPhone ~cheapYou also get results "iPhone inexpensive," forth. Use | (vertical bar) generalize searches.

title: Google General Tips and Tricks
text: get notified whenever keyword published web create Google Alert Create Google AlertIf want notified whenever keyword published webCreate Google Alert pic.twitter.com/BzE5LoCKFx

title: Google General Tips and Tricks
text: Use Google search math Use Google reverse Image Search Upload image file find information image Use [number]=language spell numbers specified language Spell NumbersHow spell 6,546,345,645? Google can tell search [number]=english pic.twitter.com/WX6II8BdA6 Play fun games Google Search Play Games Google SearchGoogle host built-games like Pac-Man, tic tac toe, Solitaire, Minesweeper, Snake. Search flip coin Google ; thing die spinner. pic.twitter.com/yp5C6466Ot Use * place words know Use asterisk place words know.forget things words easily, * come rescue.Search: imagine * todayAnd google give John Lenon silver platter.

what: Write text in chunks with knit_expand()
title: R Markdown tricks
text: x equals 5.
code: x <- 5 knitr::knit_expand(text = "x equals {{x}}.") ## [1] "x equals 5." cat(knitr::knit_expand(text = "x equals {{x}}."))

what: Why do I need to build my own package?
title: R Package Development
text: Packaging functions R packages. ? easily executable shareable code makes reusable R functions includes documentation describes use makes reproducible R code

what: How to create an R package in 4 simple steps
title: R Package Development
text: Define working directory Create r package folder Copy R folder functions r package Build check package
code: filepath <- "C:/Users/pavla/Nextcloud/GitKraken/IMS-software/ToyPackage" usethis::create_package() setwd(filepath) devtools::document() devtools::load_all() devtools::build(pkg = filepath, path = NULL, binary = FALSE, manual = TRUE) devtools::check_built(path = filepath, cran=TRUE, manual = TRUE) devtools::build_manual(pkg = filepath, path = NULL)

title: R General Tips and Tricks
text: Use alt mark multiple lines Discovered beautiful @rstudio #rstats hack days ago, wish known earlier. pic.twitter.com/b5vuB4l9Ho Use ctrl + alt_left + mouse_left spawn multiple cursors Multi-cursor editing - Repetetive code quickly written hard edit. Hold ùóîùóπùòÅ_ùóπùó≤ùó≥ùòÅ + ùó†ùóºùòÇùòÄùó≤_ùóπùó≤ùó≥ùòÅ drag mouse edit consecutive lines position. (4/7) pic.twitter.com/1uOOgcIOkd

title: R General Tips and Tricks
text: Use ctrl + Shift + c comment/uncomment entire code block Comment/uncomment blocks - Sometimes want quickly disable chunk code without deleting . Use ùóñùòÅùóøùóπ + ùó¶ùóµùó∂ùó≥ùòÅ + ùóñ (un)comment entire code blocks. (3/7) pic.twitter.com/KOH65ic4zv

what: Why should my package have a website?
title: R Package Websites
text: clear structured way presenting package user-friendly documentation package structure functions additional information sites can included via vignettes can easily created using pkgdown package

what: How to create a website for an R package in 4 simple steps
title: R Package Websites
text: Install development version GitHub Make sure working directory package folder Run configure package use pkgdown Run build website
code: devtools::install_github("MartaBofillRoig/IMS-software/ToyPackage", build = TRUE, force = TRUE) filepath <- "C:/Users/pavla/Nextcloud/GitKraken/IMS-software/ToyPackage" setwd(filepath) usethis::use_pkgdown() pkgdown::build_site()
